values.en: Our bankers will refer to this name when addressing you.
Name must be between 1 and 255 characters

We will use your preferred name and other information you provide for purposes related to assessing your application, interacting with you and verifying your identity. For more information about NAB's personal information handling practices, including how to lodge a privacy-related request, enquiry or complain, please refer to the NAB Group Privacy Notification.
